div.p: The OSDE has closed all schools for the rest of the semester.

li.a: • Is My Child Too Sick for School?

div.p: The Virtual Learning Planning Guides are available on the website. The pages will be under the elementary/high school site. You will be able to pick a guide up Monday at the Meal Handouts also. If you have a question please do not hesitate to contact your child's teacher or site administration by email. We prefer you not use Facebook as your means of communication.
There is a letter concerning school closure on the administration tab of the website.

a.aria-label: E-Notes Notification Center does Text and Email and Phone calls signup now to choose activities and stay informed so connect now

div.class: custom_6422 content-color well img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

p.span: Beginning Tuesday, March 24, Fox Public Schools will be providing FREE breakfast and lunch bags Tuesday-Friday each week to children ages 1-18. To place your children on the list, fill out the information provided on the Google Docs Link below. Once your children are on the list, they will remain on the list for the duration of the closure. Fox will be handing out the meals from 10:30-11:30 at the Fox Cafeteria, Ratliff City City Hall, and the Tatums Post Office. The Fox School office will be open Tuesday-Thursday from 9:00 am – 1:00 pm if there are any questions.
